requirements_addressed: AC-001: Individual and full sync support
AC-003: Upsert with entity ID deduplication

completion_promises.criterion_text: Command supports individual sync (by ID) and full sync (--all)
completion_promises.evidence: Command file documents /requirekit-sync [epic-id|feature-id|--all] usage pattern with examples for EPIC-001, FEAT-002, and --all. Tests TestAC001IndividualAndFullSync (4 tests) verify epic ID, feature ID, --all flag, and argument pattern documentation.

completion_promises.criterion_text: Markdown is authoritative (Graphiti rebuilt from markdown)
completion_promises.evidence: Command file explicitly states 'Markdown is the authoritative source of truth' in the opening paragraph and has a dedicated 'Markdown-Authoritative Design' section describing one-way sync with no conflict detection. Tests TestAC002MarkdownAuthoritative (3 tests) verify authoritative source documentation, read/push pattern, and no-conflict specification.

completion_promises.criterion_text: Upsert uses entity ID as deduplication key
completion_promises.evidence: Section '5. Upsert to Graphiti' explicitly documents: 'Deduplication key: Use epic_id or feature_id from the _metadata field' with upsert semantics. Tests TestAC003UpsertDeduplication (2 tests) verify upsert pattern and deduplication key documentation.

completion_promises.criterion_text: Graceful handling when Graphiti not configured
completion_promises.evidence: Dedicated 'Graphiti Not Configured' error handling section with friendly message, standalone mode explanation, and step-by-step enable instructions referencing graphiti.yaml. Tests TestAC004GracefulGraphitiUnconfigured (2 tests) verify not-configured handling and setup guidance.

completion_promises.criterion_text: Partial failure doesn't stop remaining syncs
completion_promises.evidence: Dedicated 'Partial Failure' section with example output showing mixed success/failure results where sync continues after individual failures. Also 'Invalid Markdown' section showing skip-and-continue pattern. Tests TestAC005PartialFailureHandling (3 tests) verify partial failure resilience, connection failure handling, and invalid markdown handling.

completion_promises.criterion_text: --dry-run shows what would be synced without writing
completion_promises.evidence: Dedicated 'Dry-Run Mode' section with example output showing preview of what would be synced with 'No changes written to Graphiti' confirmation. Examples section includes --dry-run usage. Tests TestAC006DryRunSupport (2 tests) verify --dry-run flag support and preview-without-writing documentation.

completion_promises.criterion_text: Output shows clear progress and summary
completion_promises.evidence: Dedicated 'Output Format' section with 'Sync Progress Display' showing per-entity progress indicators and summary with synced/skipped/failed counts and duration. Status indicator table documents emoji meanings. Tests TestAC007ProgressAndSummaryOutput (4 tests) verify progress display, summary with counts, endpoint info, and group ID in output.
